Sentencas: Sr3Fe2O7-delta (SFO) with two-layer Ruddlesden-Popper (R-P) structure has recently been proved to be a promising material for the single phase cathode in proton conducting solid oxide fuel cells (P-SOFCs).
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ

Sentencas: To investigate the hydration reactions and proton conducting mechanisms of SFO and cobalt doped SFO (SFCO), both bulk and surface properties were calculated.
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ

Sentencas: We conclude that R-P structures have advantages in P-SOFCs.
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ

Sentencas: The unique Sr-O-M layer can facilitate the hydration process.
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ

Sentencas: Although in Sr-O-F and Sr-O-N layers, it is difficult for the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies, protons are most stable.
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ

Sentencas: Furthermore, cobalt doping can not only improve the electronic conductivity but also enhance surface properties of SFCO.
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ

Sentencas: The easily exposed Co-Fe-O surface can also facilitate the hydration reactions on the surface.
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ

Sentencas: Our work could give an informative insight into the relationships among the doped elements, the R-P structures, the hydration process and the proton conducting properties.
Titulo: Atomistic insight into the hydration and proton conducting mechanisms of the cobalt doped Ruddlesden-Popper structure Sr3Fe2O7-δ
